sense.name: A formal statement with legal or social importance.
sense.examples: His declaration of innocence rattled the court. The government has made a declaration in the matter. A declaration of independence resounded throughout the land.

sense.name: (Customs) A statement of taxable goods.
sense.examples: I made a declaration of several items in my bag. My declaration was several pages long.

sense.name: (Contract bridge) the highest bid becomes the contract setting in the number of tricks that the bidder must make.
